articles.title: Insight: Some Airbnb hosts try to beat Argentina's inflation with dollar rates and tax avoidance
articles.description: As Argentina's inflation rate soared past 100% and the value of the currency slid, IT worker Luis, 33, found an economic lifeline: renting out his apartment on Airbnb for coveted dollars and finding a way to hide his earnings from the tax authorities.
articles.content: BUENOS AIRES, July 25 (Reuters) - As Argentina's inflation rate soared past 100% and the value of the currency slid, IT worker Luis, 33, found an economic lifeline: renting out his apartment on Airbnb for coveted dollars and finding a way to hide his... [7597 chars]

articles.title: ATP roundup: Dominic Thiem ekes out win in Croatia
articles.description: Austria's Dominic Thiem defeated qualifier Facundo Bagnis of Argentina 6-4, 7-5 in the first round of the Plava Laguna Croatia Open Umag on Monday.
articles.content:
July 25 - Austria's Dominic Thiem defeated qualifier Facundo Bagnis of Argentina 6-4, 7-5 in the first round of the Plava Laguna Croatia Open Umag on Monday.
The 2020 U.S. Open champion, Thiem continues to forge a comeback path after a wrist injury a... [1806 chars]

articles.title: Argentina introduces more peso exchange rates amid IMF loan review
articles.description: Argentina on Monday set new weaker trade-related exchange rates while keeping the official peso rate stable, in a push to meet expectations in its $44 billion agreement with the International Monetary Fund while avoiding a politically costly devaluation.

articles.title: Cristiana Girelli’s late header seals Italy win over Argentina in FIFA Women’s World Cup epic
articles.description: It was a hostile affair but the oldest player in the team only needed four minutes to score.
articles.content:
Italy have set up a bumper clash with FIFA Women’s World Cup title fancies Sweden after Cristiana Girelli’s late header sealed a dramatic 1-0 win over Argentina.

articles.title: Match Report & Highlights
articles.description: Match report as veteran striker Cristiana Girelli heads home Italys winner in a hard-fought win against Argentina at Eden Park in their opening Womens World Cup game; Italy had two-first half efforts ruled out for offside, but come up trumps late on to join Sweden at the top of Group G
articles.content:
Cristiana Girelli's 87th-minute header gave Italy a 1-0 win over Argentina in their Women's World Cup opener at Eden Park, denying the South Americans a first win at the global soccer showpiece.
